Sentencas: Integrated coal gasification fuel cell (IGFC) combined cycle has significant advantages in power generation efficiency and reduced environmental impacts.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of an independent microgrid comprising an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle, large-scale photovoltaics, and a pumped-storage power station

Sentencas: Use of IGFCs for coal has increased throughout the world, and its power generation efficiency is higher than that of a conventional combined cycle.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of an independent microgrid comprising an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle, large-scale photovoltaics, and a pumped-storage power station

Sentencas: This study presents a method of applying a system comprising renewable energy, pumped-storage power generation, and IGFC as an independent microgrid.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of an independent microgrid comprising an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle, large-scale photovoltaics, and a pumped-storage power station

Sentencas: The IGFC is examined for its use as base load supply with a constant output.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of an independent microgrid comprising an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle, large-scale photovoltaics, and a pumped-storage power station

Sentencas: Potential technologies for interconnection with renewable energy have only recently begun to be investigated.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of an independent microgrid comprising an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle, large-scale photovoltaics, and a pumped-storage power station

Sentencas: This study proposes an operational method for stabilizing electric power supply and demand by adjusting the daily output of the IGFC and adjusting the input and output of the pumped-storage power station for each sampling period.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of an independent microgrid comprising an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle, large-scale photovoltaics, and a pumped-storage power station

Sentencas: Furthermore, when the proposed microgrid was introduced into the power load pattern on a representative day in Hokkaido, Japan, the relation between the load factor of the IGFC and the power generation efficiency of each power source was clarified.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of an independent microgrid comprising an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle, large-scale photovoltaics, and a pumped-storage power station

Sentencas: Moreover, the economic efficiency of the proposed IGFC and integrated gasification combined cycle was investigated, and the operational advantages of the IGFC were clarified.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of an independent microgrid comprising an integrated coal gasification fuel cell combined cycle, large-scale photovoltaics, and a pumped-storage power station
